website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-use system with single camera and fairly basic functions. While is has some issues common to others in its class, the picture quality makes it worth considering.
pros: Infrared night vision mode provides better-than-average image quality
System doesn't have a lot of extra features, but it's easy to set up and use
cons: No zoom or tilt features on camera
Audio and 2.4 GHz wireless connection quality is sporadic

customer_reviews.title: Great for now but not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm for kid #1. Broke twice for kid #2. First the we replaced the battery, then the charging cable wore out (it's pretty stiff) over time by the connector that goes into the monitor. Since it broke on a Friday night and Motorola's customer service was closed on the weekend, we couldn't wait 3-5 days to get a replacement. So we bought a replacement cord at Radio Shack. Then the female piece for the charger broke so we effectively couldn't charge it anymore. Overall it's a great investment for one kid but it might breakdown past one year of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Dean O

customer_reviews.title: So because I'm a new mom I research like crazy! I research everything
customer_reviews.text: So because I'm a new mom I research like crazy! I research everything! So when I got around to researching a camera for my baby... I read horror stories about some that have other people talking to them from the outside because of wifi interference... I was like oh no no no. I found this and my kid is 3 now and I still use it! I love that it tells you the temperature, you can zoom, it's clear, I can talk to him through it and and and... it has a long cable so I can put it anywhere and it reaches to wherever I am. All my friends switched theirs out for this one!
customer_reviews.author: Eiman Hamza

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Only needs small improvements
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for over 2 years. The screen was all messed up on the first one they sent. But the replacement hasn't let me down. CONS: The pictures on the buttons wear off easily. I wish the buttons had little lights on them so I know which one to push at night. The 'speak to the baby' button should not be right next to the 'look at the baby' button. Sometimes I accidentally hit the wrong one and it makes a noise in her room. PROS: LOVE that it tells me the temperature, love that I can move the camera around to find her. Have not had any issues. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best monitor!
customer_reviews.text: We love this monitor! I did a ton of research before buying this camera, I wanted the best for my child! I eventually found this monitor and with the extra privacy feature I choose this one. I've used it for about 6 months and have never had an issue with it! The reception has always been great, which is something I was concerned about since we live in a 2 story home. I love the temperature read out, talk back feature and the night vision is great! I just wish the zoom quality was better! I'm about to buy an additional monitor for my next babies room. Try this monitor out, I bet you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: SourthernLady2011

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Solder Connection Renders it Useless
customer_reviews.text: We've had THREE of these units (replacements that Motorola sent us for less money than a new one, but still close to $100), and each one of these units has had problems with the charging cord connection with the unit. We just took apart the 3rd unit to see what was up and it is the solder. It is very small and breaks very easily. This has been our problem. Time to email Motorola again. Definitely not paying for a fourth replacement unit. :( So sad as this was a really expensive monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: HATE it. it only work for one year and ...
customer_reviews.text: HATE it. it only work for one year and then broke. Don't waste your money on this but a different one. When you call Motorola they are no help and wont do anything for you but tell you to buy a new one. The parent monitor power button will break exactly right when the warrantee expires. And you cant but a replacement parent unit only the camaras for the baby room. They don't sell any parts actually. Just don't buy this bottom line and spend your money else where and never will buy Motorola again
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: So--good news--simple set up--didnt even have to pair. Bad news: NO MUTE button (and the low level vol is still not that low) AND the volume controls have to be accessed by menu--they need hard buttons on the outside--which instead are taken by the camera control buttons. My guess is that people will care more about changing volume than camera orientation--and at night--no one wants to fiddle with the menu keys. ALSO--and here is the killer--my WiFi keeps interfering with the camera--which causes it to TURN off with an audible alarm/beep. Totally uncool. Hate to say it--but it's going back (AND IT CAME WITH NO SHIPPING INFO!!!). BOOO. Ready to go back to my 900hz analog Summer monitor--static and all.
customer_reviews.author: ADUB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, but be ready to buy a new battery in a year
customer_reviews.text: Overall works fantastic! One down side is that the battery has a "memory", and after a year would not hold a charge for more than about 10-seconds. They should have used a Li battery in my opinion. Other issue is that in night node, the IR LEDs will completely illuminate and render s opaque any (otherwise see-through) mesh, for instance on the side of portable cribs or play-pens. This requires the camera to be mounted with a downward view instead of a side view, but is an issue with physics, not with this or any camera that uses IR illumination technology.
customer_reviews.author: Doc P

customer_reviews.title: Great device, battery life not spectacular
customer_reviews.text: The image is very clear, even in the dark. Panning feature is nice to help locate the kid in the crib. However the battery life of the screen is not very long if you keep the image on all of the time (probably less than 2.5 hours). So you gotta learn to turn the screen off manually (auto setting leaves screen on for long time) in order to make the battery last. No chance of this thing lasting through the night on your bed stand not plugged in. Does have a fairly loud alarm to notify you when battery is low as well as visual red light indicator.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: It's great for keeping an eye and ear on the little ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using it every night for over 4 years now and hasn't failed me yet. Room temperature is accurate, picture is clear and does everything it's supposed to do. I'm really impressed with the distance. It's great for keeping an eye and ear on the little one at night while she sleeps and I'm able to go to my neighbors house next door without the monitor loosing the signal. My house is in a subdivision by the way and it holds its signal for about 300 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Loved this camera until it broke. The camera does not work anymore and it's outside the warranty window. This was an investment and it only lasted 2 years. Sounds like a lot but when you're buying an expensive monitor you buy it with the intention of keeping it for all of your children. But now with number 2 newborn the camera suddenly stopped working. A very frustrating experience.
customer_reviews.author: dband

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe
customer_reviews.text: By not safe I mean that the product comes with an as is warranty. The one I bought ceased functioning, when I contacted this company they stated: "We are an electrical contractor who builds substations for wind farms." That they do not sell on Amazon. Well, it was Amazon where I purchased the product and Paradigm Enterprises refused to correct/replace their defective merchandise. This is a poor quality product and I advise against purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: gene

customer_reviews.title: Best video monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. We have had now for almost 2 years and still works great. The screen is big , much bigger than most other monitors I've seen. I also like how you can pan camera to see full crib. I now use with a second camera I added for different room when I babysit my niece. Neat how you can use one monitor for both and you can buy add on at a separate time. I believe it connects up to three different cameras. Really No complaints. The only negative I can say is the music on it is awful but I really didn't mind because I don't use that.
customer_reviews.author: BHG

customer_reviews.title: This monitor looses charge very quickly over a short period ...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor looses charge very quickly over a short period of time. And once you get to a point where you can only use it when plugged in it peeps and wakes you up numerous times during the night (because it is defective). We've been through three of these monitors. Tow we purchased and one was sent to us from customer service.
customer_reviews.author: vt97john

customer_reviews.title: Better than the previous model
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace our baby monitor that was the previous model of this because I am a klutz. Anyways, this newer version is SO much better!! The screen is bigger. The range is longer so I can take it outside to play with my 2 year old while the baby sleeps. You can even move the camera from the handset unlike the previous model that was stationary. Very pleased with this purchase,
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M.

customer_reviews.title: Now the monitor can't hold a charge and its now useless!! I thought purchasing this expensive monitor and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the monitor for my daughter less than two years ago. She has had nothing but trouble with this piece of equipment. Within 7 months the cord/charger needed to be reaplaced ( $25.00 extra). After replacing the cord the unit then began to lose signal on a consistent basis. Just recently the actual input (power) on the monitor broke (internally). Now the monitor can't hold a charge and its now useless!! I thought purchasing this expensive monitor and camera system would've been worth the money.. Now it seems like it was a waste of money. During the same timeframe I purchased a Summerly Monitor and Camera system for $100 and it still works TO THIS DAY!!
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: So unbelievably happy we chose this one.
customer_reviews.text: Daytime image quality, great. Nighttime image quality, great. Sound quality, great. Pan and tilt, GREAT - trust me, you DEFINITELY need this capability. Honestly, I couldn't be happier about making this purchase ... well worth the price. I don't think the competing products would have given us half the peace of mind that this one brings. TIP: Buy an extra AC adapter so you don't have to cart one around with you all the time, the monitor battery does not last forever if you keep the video on. I bought thisand it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted. Broke after 1.5 years.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved having this. It really gave us the peace of mind with our daughter. However, the electrical connection for the adapter on the parent unit broke after 1.5 years. I originally thought it was the adapter, but bought a replacement one (not from Motorola of course since they don't have replacement adapters) the unit still didn't charge unless the cord was wiggled and just in the right angle and pressure. We bought it using our AMEX card so we got our money back. Hesitating to buy another one. Probably not.
customer_reviews.author: N. Nishizaka

customer_reviews.title: Quality Monitor
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to keep track of our child and make sure she wasn't pulling covers over her face or losing her pacifier. When plugged in the monitor works constantly. When not plugged in, the receiver turns off after 2 minutes, but the sound still comes through. This saves battery time and you can also just tap a button and get video feed again. I will tell you right now this is about the best video quality you can get from a baby monitor. We had a couple others that supposedly rated high and were absolutely nothing in comparison to this Motorola. Easy interface. You can even control and move the camera from the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time Mom, I did a lot of research before choosing a monitor and I am very pleased with this one. Pros - - Clear video display - Remote adjustment of camera and zoom - Night vision Cons - - The camera isn't wireless. I would like it if this unit had the option of running off of a battery for temporary relocation. - Battery life could be longer. Overall I'm happy with the purchase and performance. I feel at ease with my daughter sleeping and knowing I can easily keep an eye and ear on her.
customer_reviews.author: JLSinSEA

customer_reviews.title: broke 2 months after 1 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: Very tricky to charge now...either due to the plug, or the power port itself. When it does work, the video is pretty good, night vision just ok, and audio is fine. Range is decent, but haven't tried maxing it out. I have previously recommended this cam to friends, but now I'm regretting that decision. UPDATE Feb 17 2014: Now the display is nearly impossible to view because the quality is so bad. Not sure if this is a display or camera issue. Continues to be nearly impossible to charge. Sad to say this tech is destined to be recycled sometime soon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rosa

customer_reviews.title: We bought this model 2 years ago We really like it but the monitor unit fell and won't take ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this model 2 years ago We really like it but the monitor unit fell and won't take a charge anymore. So, I re-ordered this since our warranty was no longer good Instead of the mbp36 we got mbp33 which is a cheaper unit that does not have an option for electronically moving the cameras- you have to move them manually I want to return it to get the correct model but am worried I'm just going to get the same 33 again
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The best monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of these but nothing this good. The display is clear all over the house, even the nighttime(IR) is good and clear. The ability to pan is nice but is mostly used by the older kids as a toy. The sound is good both directions. The sounds/lullabies played are kind of an after thought and not really something that I would call relaxing. Nice to have a temperature reading for cold nights. The only negative: The little "kick stand" or flap to hold the monitor upright is thin and cracked easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Requires some sort of night light...
customer_reviews.text: We love this video monitor for the most part. It's was easy to set up and has been of great use. However, the downside is that in order to use it at night and actually see your child on the video if you want to check on them before going in their room, unless there is a BRIGHT night light on in the room, you can't see anything on the screen no matter how you adjust the brightness settings. My child sometimes cries and talks in his sleep, so it's hard to tell sometimes if he's just doing this in his sleep or if he's woken up, which he sometimes does, and needs Mommy for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: dmshoney

customer_reviews.title: Monitor Malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Firstly: LOVE a video monitor. However, this monitor has malfunctioned twice. First time,it wouldn't turn on at all, even when plugged in. Second time, the power button wouldn't work. Both times, the unit was under warranty, so exchanging the unit with Amazon customer service is/was easy. However, I'm VERY concerned about what's going to happen when it inevitably malfunctions once the warranty is up. We rely heavily on this monitor, and don't want to shell out another couple hundred bucks on a replacement when this should last longer than a year! (Initial purchase approximately around Christmas 2011, replacement monitor sent August 2012. Second replacement of this monitor is still in process.)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Best I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one originally 6 years ago. The power button just stopped working on it. So I bought this one so it can connect with my old set. Best monitor i have owned
customer_reviews.author: bena

customer_reviews.title: ... and this is the only one that I have liked so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been through most of the other models of the video baby monitors and this is the only one that I have liked so far. Good battery life, excellent picture, great night vision. Don't get hung up on some of the gimmicky features offered by the other models. Stick to what you really need this thing for and I think that this is the best option. It took me about three months to finally land the right one after having purchased and returned other units.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Foley

customer_reviews.title: It seems great except for one little thing... no audio off!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Motorola MBP36 based on its features and great reviews. I was really happy with the quality and features until I noted that the audio cannot be turned off completely. I like to turn the audio off when I know my little one is awake but still needs a few minutes to fully wake up and, more importantly, during the night when the audio component is not necessary to wake me if she really needs me (it will just cause me to wake unnecessarily at every noise). Unfortunately, this unit is being returned and the hunt for a new video monitor resumes.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia and Alex

customer_reviews.title: Worked great..
customer_reviews.text: Worked great...for all of 3 weeks. Waste of very good money. Too bad we waited so long to open it, otherwise we would've immediately returned it. The sound stopped working for no reason, which for a sleeping parent is the most important feature. How horrible to wake up to find your young child screaming and crying while the monitor right next to you is silent. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The best camera ever
customer_reviews.text: The best camera ever! so far 2.5 years and still working like new! You can talk to your baby,. know the temperature in the room, put music, is night vision (mean that you can see your baby with the room light off) YOU CAN MOVE AND ZOOM IN AND OUT the camera, is awesome! I also used many times in our RV to watch our daughter when is sleeping and we want to stay outside with a glass of wine. Im not a Motorola fan (maybe for their cellphones) but for this product i can say they made it well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: BIG DISAPPOINTMENT from a well known brand.
customer_reviews.text: so many issues with no only this monitor but the brand. A HUGE disappointment. Were on our third one which does work but the cameras are HUGE and impossible to mount correctly and still have full rotation that you want. My sister had the same issue and switched to the "Summer" brand and said she likes it better. Were holding on to this one while its still working sense they will only replace and not refund it.
customer_reviews.author: JCR

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: After doing much, much, much research, my husband and I finally decided on this Video Monitor. Our goal was good range, good price, good picture. We definitely achieved all of these with this monitor. We don't have a very big house, so this monitor is perfect. We get a perfect picture no matter where we are in the house. I was also able to walk the way to the back of the backyard, and the picture stayed perfect. We've seen no grainy-ness at all. I'm not typically a big Motorola fan after having bad cellphones, but would definitely consider using them again after this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McNulty

customer_reviews.title: The monitor works great, but needs a setting for video shutdown
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is pretty much what you would expect, EXCEPT there is no way to prevent the monitor from "sleeping" the display after a few minutes when unplugged. If I had known that beforehand I would NOT have purchased this monitor. Sure, maybe they're trying to save the battery, but shouldn't that be my choice if I want the video to be on for more than a few minutes? That is really annoying. Other than that this monitor is fine, but I would have gone with the Samsung equivalent (assuming that one doesn't auto-sleep).
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for watching your baby
customer_reviews.text: Only reason for four stars is because you can't clip it to your belt or clothes while the baby is sleeping. Tougher than that is is the nest I have had yet and I have had three. Temp monitoring is very handy. Night vision is very good and quite. Monitor is clear and very easy to read while battery life is very good as well. We just charge it at night. Just wish they had the belt clip. The kickstand is better than other mostly because the rubber feet on the bottom keep it from sliding around on your night stand at night. Trust me, that is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Is your baby really asleep?
customer_reviews.text: Albeit the only camera I've used so far, this one came highly recommended from a friend who has gone through several. After seven months of use, my wife and I couldn't be happier with it. Even though you can't view the video stream over the internet or on your phone, I haven't found myself wishing I could. With a great pan and tilt camera, room temperature display, and excellent night vision camera, I believe this is one of the best units on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Opp

customer_reviews.title: Everything is OK except power supplies.
customer_reviews.text: Video, sound are good. Do not expect HD quality to upload to YouTube but it serves the main goal of monitoring babies. We bought an additional camera to monitor both kids (we have twins). The only complain is power supply quality. They have tiny wires which brake easily around connectors and power supply. For the 2 years, we replaced all motorola original with compatible from ebay. Also ordered a replacement battery since the original already works for half hour only.
customer_reviews.author: gfx

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor and camera, declining battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for about a year and a half now. Great baby monitor, great remote controls of the viewing angle. After this amount of time though, the use time of the unplugged monitor while using the battery has decreased severely. It advertises 3.5 hours, which it did last right when I bought the product, but after about a year of regular use, it has declined to about an hour. I expected this would happen, but I thought it would last longer before the battery started to die.
customer_reviews.author: Sam W

customer_reviews.title: Great straightforward monitor! Update - still works 5 years later!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this monitor for our 5 month old baby and love it. It is super easy to use and worked right out of the box. It is such a relief to be able to watch our baby while he sleeps. The video quality is great and we can see our baby easily in the dark. The handheld monitor is easy to use and user friendly. I also really appreciate that it tells you what temp the room is! Update: 5+ years later and this monitor is still going strong! It has survived many vacations and also being played with by a preschooler.
customer_reviews.author: 5booksaday

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this monitor and all its features. Very easy to use! Clear picture day and night and very large screen. Only complaint is every once in a while it loses signal with the base and starts beeping. Its very random. Sometimes it will fix itself within seconds or minutes but other times I have had to turn it off/on to get it to work again properly. My daughter still sleeps in my room at night so we only use it during the day. If it does this during the night I see this having the potential to be a big problem... So far it is not so often that I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bri dawley

customer_reviews.title: Broken and no customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product broke after about 6 months. The night vision completely stopped working. The sound only works intermittently. And to top it off, it is impossible to get a hold of customer service. I wanted to work with them before writing a bad review but after more than 30 minutes of trying, I still have not spoken to a person or been directed to the correct place online. I am frustrated and without a night time monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great! only two issues
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is absolutely great! The only thing that i dont like about it is the battery life and the roaming. If i charge it all day and turn it on at 7pm when my son goes to sleep it will start beeping by 4am saying the battery is dead. Would expect a better battery life from a company that manufactures batteries! Anyway also i live in a 3 story brownstone and when baby on the third and me on the first sometimes the monitor will shut off and search for a signal and the screen will be off until it picks up a signal and at that point you cant see baby.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: First one we had didn't last a full year, ...
customer_reviews.text: First one we had didn't last a full year, the monitor stopped working unless it was plugged in (we replaced batteries and it still wouldn't work). So we continued to use and then the monitor stopped working all together. We replaced it after it completely died and the second one came straight from manufacture and the monitor didn't work at all. Only comes with one camera. For the price, it should at least come with 2 cameras to one monitor.
customer_reviews.author: tarynm

customer_reviews.title: This unit got good ratings.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift so I can't say first hand how it is. But my daughter loves it. They had a different brand for their first child but it stopped working. Now there is a new baby on the way. This one has the pan feature which is wonderful...especially when the baby is older and moves around in the crib. There are no blind spots when the baby ends up in the far side of the crib or curls up in a corner. It's great that you can add two more cameras.
customer_reviews.author: MaJeHi

customer_reviews.title: Simple and straight to the point...
customer_reviews.text: Got it just yesterday and it was better than I expected.. Had looked at Summer/Samsung brands but trusted the reviews on this monitor and I am not disappointed. Sound, video and configurations are great. Turned on device and bingo I was viewing images from across my house without any problem. The sound settings are ok, wish it had a mute but then again it's kind of nice to hear my son's sound machine via the monitor (very faintly). I will definitely in the near future order another monitoring camera... I'll update this in the coming weeks seeing I've only used it one day...
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio Acosta

customer_reviews.title: First impressions.
customer_reviews.text: Length of ownership: Just got today. Set up: Easy. < 5 min. Camera: Clear, night vision works well. All functions (zoom, pan etc) work great! Speaker: No one in house to test speaker clarity at the moment. Range: Currently ~80 feet btw camera and monitor. Works well. Hopefully will provide additional info after few days of use. Monitor: Picture is crisp. Overall - I have high hopes. I'll let you know if it lives up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: IntCards

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded to this over our older summer infant set up. Very high quality, nice screen, great battery life, great range, you can switch between cameras if you buy extras, tells you the temperature in the room, and you can even push a button and talk through the camera to your child! Only wish it had a belt clip or key lock so I could put it my pocket. It's a tabletop only- but does have a nifty kick stand. Also has a swing up antenna for more range, but we haven't needed it yet. The infrared LED's in the camera are not visible in the dark, unlike the summer infant camera which glows like a scary alien at night.
customer_reviews.author: Zimm

customer_reviews.title: Baby is 5 month old and monitor does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor after reading great reviews about it, but my baby is 5 month old and the on/off switch does not work any longer. For the price of this monitor it is incredible that it broke down with less than 6 months of use. I would definitely NOT recommend this monitor. It may work great when it does work but how can Motorola justify that it stops working so fast. Now I have to search and invest in a new monitor. Do not risk buying this monitor, try a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Estelar

customer_reviews.title: Almost there!
customer_reviews.text: I bought an extra camera with this model because we have a few rooms to watch. The pros to this product are many while the cons are few. The night vision is not as good as advertised, you can only connect up to 4 cameras, per monitor, and if you have an 1000watt microwave or higher, when it's on, it scrambles your signal. Other than those cons, its a pretty nice product, albeit a bit overpriced. Very close to a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: M. Granata

customer_reviews.title: Great until just after the warranty expired....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this right before my twins were born. It was great for about 14 months. I never had a problem, it got a great signal no matter where I was around the house, sound and picture was good as well. Then one day it would not recognize or charge when the screen was plugged in, so the battery died and it won't recharge. As expensive as it was, I expect better quality. I need to buy another monitor now which is annoying and costly!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney White

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor! I have two cameras so that I can watch each of my kids in their rooms. The monitor switches back and forth between the two rooms automatically every 10 seconds so I can rest easy! Best monitor I have found after all my research
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This set of camera comes with one camera and one monitor. You put the camera near the crib or wherever you want to monitor and the other monitor goes with you. You can adjust the camera left, right, up, or down from the monitor. You can also zoom in a bit closer. These are the functions that you'd probably use most. No other fancy functions but it does its job well. The only thing is that I wish the resolution could be a little clearer (first world problem, yes).
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the first month
customer_reviews.text: Motorola replaced the broken unit, but we went for a week without a monitor after the first unit broke within the first month. Video quality is good, and the features are easy to use and nice to have. Zoom is great, sound levels are good. Brightness is nice to be able to adjust at times. Motorola replaced our 2012 unit with one from 2011, so I wasn't thrilled about that either, but it's functioned fine for the last few months.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mcrae

customer_reviews.title: More $$$, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Lorex LW2003 (see my reviewed on Amazon), and eventually decided to try something else given its poor range in our large house: it would not work throughout the house, or outside. The Motorola monitor is easy to use and the range is incredible. Both claim similar ranges in the open, but the difference between them is night-and-day. I walked several hundred feet away, past my neighbors house, before giving up with a couple bars left. Well worth it if you want to use it outside or have a large house.
customer_reviews.author: M Brown

customer_reviews.title: So far love it
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews for Wireless Video monitors and was just about driving myself crazy over making a decision. I could't decide between this one and the summer infant and went for the Motorola due to the size of the screen and because of the 20% amazon moms discount. Super glad I chose this one. It was super easy to set up and we love that we can have multiple cameras. I am not sure why we did not get one sooner. The picture at night is pretty impressive with the room being so dark. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: JenT

customer_reviews.title: Tried TWICE!  Don't waste your money!!!Stops Charging.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these, soon the screen stopped charging! We bought a replacement that worked fine for about 1 month and then the cord stopped working. We bought a new one which also stopped working in short order, we would have to fiddle it just right to lean against the lamp. Last night the internal pin that the charger hooks into snapped. Sooo Done with this product, $400.00 later :-/
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Davis- Bourque

customer_reviews.title: GAVE THEM TWO CHANCES!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this monitor in the beginning... so much I ordered a second one. Lets just say i'm glad I ordered the second one because the first one just stopped responding. And now, after only 4months of use, the second one is also not responding. When the first time broke down, I contacted motorola (time to return in Amazon had passed) and they sent a new one. I don't know what to do about the second one not working. Very uncomfortable! Its great when it works. Also, the battery starts dying after 3-4 months!!! I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MGRevilla

customer_reviews.title: Great for as long as it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic baby monitor. Just what we were looking for. Clear video, good night vision, controls, etc. The only issue we've had is that the on/off button just broke after 19 months. We like it enough to get another one of the same thing, but it's a lot of money to have something as simple as a button break. It would also be nice if they could add some controls so that you only hear sounds after a certain volume of crying or after a certain duration, so random one-time cries don't always wake you up.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Gives us piece of mind whenever we are on a different floor or another room and still able to hear and watch our baby. The large color screen is nice but we mostly use the night vision (shows in black & white) since the room is usually dark. The pan/zoom is nice and the temperature gauge is very handy. We've been using it for about a month now and no problems so far, hope this product lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Bugaboo

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor. Have 3 cameras hooked up for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor. Have 3 cameras hooked up for the 3 kids bedrooms. I love the ability to move the camera so I can see what my son (3yrs old) is doing when out of bed. The monitor toggles between the cameras but I don't mind not having all 3 on screen at the same time. Can go to one room when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the splurge for reassurance
customer_reviews.text: This product is well worth the price for the reassurance it provides. I have used it every day for about 5 months. It can move around easily to different places where baby falls asleep. I can see him breathing at night and in the day (very important to me). Resolution is great. The distance for the monitor could be better but all things considered, it's hard to imagine how parents have gotten along for so long with out it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product with incredible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I feel compelled to write a review since I just had to replace the monitor on this product. It has worked well, with a long battery life, for over 15 months. I keep this unit on for at least 12 hours every night and between 2 and 5 hours of overlapping naps a day. The cameras are great and so is the monitor. Last night, however, the monitor stopped charging. I'm not sure what happened, but I called the Motorola customer service number, and without hesitation they apologized and are sending me a new replacement. Amazing product with incredible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: SBarton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MONITOR
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS MONITOR! This does not even compare to our old Summer Infant one. i have 2 kids and had to have the scan feature. It goes back and forth between the rooms all night, so i can sleep peacefully knowing both rooms are covered. Picture on monitor is very clear, love being able to tell my 2 year old to lay down and get back in bed, and the temp setting is kinda fun too.
customer_reviews.author: 2LittlesMama

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We've been using it for 4 months now. In a three story townhouse we always have excellent reception, even in the basement. When fully charged it lasts a long time on battery. I'll echo all the good stuff everyone says. And throw in my 2 cents on the buttons. A dedicated volume button/scroll would have been nice. Even better would have been a dedicated mute button! I also wish the power button was raised...can be pain trying to find it. Minor nits...overall we're very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Maestro

customer_reviews.title: using for husband
customer_reviews.text: Dementia person and love it. if you go into the garage and shut door(detached) you lose it. But in the house really clear. you can move the camera around the room to follow him as he moves in the kitchen and front room . found spot in middle and can follow him as i set down stairs and paint pictures. can even talk to him .... great---- they need to get this in the Altz. store as it is great so far.
customer_reviews.author: rbcf

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not acceptable at this price.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I loved this monitor... no complaints, except for one: it keeps breaking. 2 times now, same problem: if you leave this unit at max volume (purportedly) ... it will quickly blow out the speaker on the unit. The final result is no audio whatsoever. Despite the incomprehensible: Motorola instructed me to run the unit at lower volumes (um, then why allow me to choose higher volumes?) ... we did so (one notch lower). It still blew out the speaker. All this, given the volume is not really loud to begin with. Mediocre quality. I recommend: pass on this unit, if you can find better.
customer_reviews.author: Danbucks

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying our video monitor. The only problem we had was the first we got was defective; bad speaker on the camera unit. Went through the easy replacement process on Amazon.com and got a replacement and it works great. Loving the video; can turn video off on monitor while still listening. LED noise indicator is great for a visual response. Ability to pan camera around is great - although a newborn doesn't move around much...lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are very pleased with this baby monitor, although I returned the Amazon order and got one at Babies-r-Us with 2 cameras when it was on sale plus a 20% off coupon made it like getting an extra camera for free. The only negative for me is that it needs total full on light to get it out of black and white/ night mode, which means that its always in black and white mode. My wife has it on all the time with music and the range is good enough to go outside into the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Tom 48

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: Better than our Summer Infant monitor. Syncs easily, has great range, plenty of great options. The zoom does get a bit grainy, but it still gets the job done. I love the scanning feature between multiple cameras. I wish they had included a belt hook...I have to carry this in my pocket and because the front buttons protrude a bit, I sometimes change cameras or tilt the camera unintentionally. Otherwise, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Wes Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and functional, does not penetrate masonery walls very well
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product in many ways, especially the durability. Our little rascal has dropped both the monitor as well as the camera several times and I am amazed at the durability.Only downsides are 1. The range of the Bluetooth could be better. Our house has all masonry walls and the signal just doesn't go through them well. 2. I wish the BT had the option to send to the computer as well as the screen.. Other than that an excellent product
customer_reviews.author: G. Luigi Rota V.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk charging port
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace another Motorola monitor that had lasted approximately 3 years. We also needed another camera b/c of the addition of another child, so this bundle seemed to fit our needs. We've had this product for just over three months and the port for the charger is now malfunctioning. If you actually hold the jack at just the correct angle and pressure, it will charge the monitor. Otherwise, the battery will drain. Of course we are now two weeks past the return deadline. Unacceptable for $180.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your 3rd Eye
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this monitor. I feel comfortable leaving my baby under its gaze. The picture is clear night and day. I have used it all winter and it has been great always knowing the temp was not to high or to low. It has a large selection of options that are great such as an alarm. I live in a 3 storie house and the range covers the whole house. The only thing missing is a clip to be able to carry it around hands free. For those living or moving to Europe it is CE compliant.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: We are across the house and 1 floor down from the baby room. It is not a big house but I was still not comfortable being that far away without being able to check in her every time it crossed my mind. This allows me to see if she is awake or sleeping. It is hard to see her breathing so if I can't tell for sure I still go upstairs but a lot of times I'll see her twitch or something and be able to relax again without running up there.
customer_reviews.author: M0m of 2

customer_reviews.title: Please do not buy it. Replaced three times.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago and it needed to be replaced three times. Now I am without warranty and is not working. The issue is the sound. You can see you baby but can't hear... so there is no point of trying to sleep peacefully and without worries. Please do not spend you money in this equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: We've owned it for about 5 months now and have very pleased with the high resolution
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this monitor after much research. We've owned it for about 5 months now and have very pleased with the high resolution, the high volume, and ease of using the built-in functions. We have had no issues with battery life or reception. Being able to remotely pan and tilt the camera is a HUGE reason to buy this monitor. 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor broke after less than a year of occasional use. Motorola replaced the unit for us with a similar model, and within only 3 months of use the "new" monitor was also broken from only occasional use. Motorola is charging us to replace the second failed monitor. Their video monitors leave much to be desired, and if I had it to do over again would not spend the money on this piece of junk. At this point we're pouring money down a bottomless pit to obtain replacements. We will not purchase Motorola products any longer. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: newj

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor with ability to rotate
customer_reviews.text: Provides a clear picture and great sound. I like that you can rotate the camera around from the monitor. You also have the ability to turn off the screen and just use the sound, which is helpful at night. The temperature gauge is very helpful too. Only thing I would prefer is the ability to turn the sound slightly more, the lowest level is just a bit loud for me sometimes. I also wish the monitor had a clock on it. It would be helpful when I wake up in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: tnz

customer_reviews.title: ... this monitor for about three years now and we love it. No interference
customer_reviews.text: We have used this monitor for about three years now and we love it. No interference, excellent range, multiple camera capability, and good sound control. Our last monitor the sound never went low enough, so even regular sleeping noises were too loud. This one is great. The lights on the handheld unit are a little bright.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Lahr

customer_reviews.title: good all around but buttons need to be lit
customer_reviews.text: I like almost everything about this monitor except for the fact that using it in the dark in nearly impossible. The buttons should glow or be backlit for easier use. Since the buttons are the same for different functions, it is especially important to be able to see them so you can choose the right one for what you want without having to turn on a light. The talk-back function is great and the images are good.
customer_reviews.author: MOM2LNE

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor
customer_reviews.text: I really love this monitor. Works pretty well, no interference at all, nice night vision and the sound is really really clear. The only negative point is that the monitor battery does not last to long, it's better you use it wired all the times. I would like most if the camera could work wireless too so you could take it to different places. 1 year update: after 1 year, I must say that the battery has gone. It only works wired.
customer_reviews.author: Arans

customer_reviews.title: Best Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of this unit. We LOVE it. We did however have to buy a second unit because I dropped the first one and the screen broke out of warranty. I wish you could buy just a replacement screen but that isn't an option so we had to buy the whole thing again $$$. Oh well...we have baby #2 now and I wouldn't change it now.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie A Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I have!
customer_reviews.text: I had this monitor since my kids were babies. They are now 5 and 6yrs. old, and I am still using it. Now I use it as an intercom to call them out for dinner, chores, etc. I also check on them with the monitor when they are in the room playing, and I'm busy around the house. The rotatable camera allows me to see them anywhere in their room, which is very helpful. And the screen is very clear and big. Sound quality is adjustable and good. I had 2 different monitors before I bought this one, and this one is by far the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing! I love it. I can zoom in, move the camera around and talk to my baby in the room if I want all from the parent controller. I is so easy to use and has a better range than most. The battery life on the parent controller is really good too. It lasts the whole night not being plugged in. The volume can also be adjusted so if the baby is crying I can turn it down until they are done. I just love this monitor!!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Not quite 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars except that the speaker function is terrible, when you talk into it your voice is very muffled and it is very hard to understand what is being said. We use this to monitor watch what our kids are doing down in the lower level of our home and when you try to talk to them through the monitor it is very hard for them to understand. Other than that the monitor is awesome and the picture quality is very good. If they would improve the two way function it would be more than 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Vickix6

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I rated this with 2 stars because the video quality is excellent and I like the panoramic function, otherwise I would give this 1 star because I am on my 3rd monitor and the battery life of this monitor isn't good. I have to keep it plugged in wherever I go. The first monitor we ordered arrived with a scratched screen, the second had poor reception after the first week of use--would not work if you were more than 4 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: ktmac

customer_reviews.title: becareful
customer_reviews.text: becareful. this thing is nice. or at least it was for the first 8 weeks, then the sound died and the video got a little weird. but the warranty people were great when you talked to them in person. internet warranty was a joke. make sure you call them and they will take care of you if there is a problem......but I am wondering how long this one will last.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer problem.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the product because the first time we used it the display showed only white screen. Couldn't use it. We didn't ask for exchange because we had to ship it to Guatemala, and make a return from Guatemala was difficult enough to risk to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is terrific. Does everything as described. Picture quality and infared clarity is amazing. I turn it on sometimes at night so I don't have to shine a light in my baby's face to see what's going on. Buttons are self explanatory and intuitive. No interference with any of my electronics including, phone, WIFI, TV,radio, microwave etc. Love the bigger screen but probably could have saved a few bucks and gone with the 2.8 in screen.
customer_reviews.author: JWM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful monitor
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality on this monitor is awesome day or night, We love the pan, tilt and zoom feature. It also has a walkie Talkie type feature which works great when I need something from another room or to talk to the baby. It shows the the temperature so that we are assured that the baby is not too hot or too cold. I've seen many other video monitors and this one seems to be the best that I have seen. We have had no WiFi problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sacgirl2

customer_reviews.title: Monitor is great, make sure all parts are present in box.
customer_reviews.text: I just had to order a replacement battery pack for this unit because the wireless video screen that holds the battery pack was missing the tiny screw that held the battery pack in place. I have been fussing with it multiple times every day to keep the batteries in place and the wire finally broke today. Cannot live without the monitor, as it works great overall. Never heard back from manufacturer when I initially requested they send me a new backplate and screw.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole & Daniel

customer_reviews.title: AV/TV cable?
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the camera. Works great, control is good, night vision is good, etc. One thing is I cannot find a suitable AV/TV cable to connect to the mini-USB out of the handheld monitor to the TV. I've searched stores all around and it's just a very rare cable apparently. I've tried to make my own with other TV cables that convert to computer connectors and have had no luck. I wish Motorola would've made an easier way to connect to the TV so I can watch my baby from the TV.
customer_reviews.author: P-factor

customer_reviews.title: SOUND RANDOMLY STOPS WORKING!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY-- SOUND STOPS WORKING RANDOMLY IN MIDDLE OF NIGHT! this monitor worked great, in the beginning! Now it is averaging at lease once a week that the sound stops working in the middle of the night and it is literally by the grace of God that I woke up to check on my baby and sure enough the sound had stopped working again. Last night it stopped working twice at night. The whole point of a monitor is to most importantly HEAR your baby when they need you. Look for a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Rmb23

customer_reviews.title: This item is poor quality for this money!
customer_reviews.text: After having Infant Summer for 3 years we decided to get something more advanced and spend some more money. Worked just for first month, then died. Video quality during night time is poor. Audio is poor. Compare to old summer infant system. I did expect more from this camera. Do not buy!!! Just got Infant Optics and it is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Romdoc

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. We have two- one at home and one at vacation spot. Great sound, great picture. KEY: Save your receipt- Motorola has a 1 year warranty and if it breaks (the buttons start to stick on the monitor) they will send you a new one - no questions asked. Like all other monitors we have had they have a 2 to 3 year lifespan at most....
customer_reviews.author: jzana

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor!!!
customer_reviews.text: As this was my first baby monitor purchase, I was having a hard time picking one out due to a lack of experience and the widely varied reviews on most video monitor setups. I have to say I am extremely pleased with this product. I bought it here on Amazon and Im tempted to buy another as opposed to just adding an additional camera and then linking them together. If you're on the fence about which brand to get...Buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Really good video monitor and works great during day and night
customer_reviews.text: Really good video monitor and works great during day and night. Good voice sensitivity and range. Very clear pictures. Bought this after extensive review as most sites said this was the best monitor. Reason I give it 4 stars, is when I am streaming using airplay to apple TV, signals drop from 5 to 0 to 5 and become very erratic with skip images etc. This needs to be fixed. Otherwise great
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: We originally purchased this item in September 2012. We are now on monitor #3 because they keep breaking. The first one, the video unit stopped charging. The second one, the camera stopped working during night vision ,the third one, the camera is not working on night vision and the video unit will no longer charge. I believe the video unit has a design flaw where the cord plugs into the unit. The fit is not tight and over time, it becomes too loose and no longer makes a good connection to fully charge or even work while plugged in. I don't recommend this monitor although I am not sure there are any better alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product good... Service is TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is GREAT until the battery craps out. I called Motorola explaining that I purchased the monitor well before my baby was born. I explained the monitor was in use for under 1 year and they told me because my warranty goes by the date of purchase there is nothing they could do and that I should go to Radio Shack and get a new battery. Since Motorola doesn't seem to care too much about customer satisfaction, this will be the last product I buy from them. There are simply too many other options these days.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Something I cannot live without
customer_reviews.text: Well let's start by saying that this motorola baby monitor is the only one in the market that beats all expections... It's has everything I need, video, audio, temperature control, even zoom... You can even see the room 360 degrees..: honestly I have bought 4 from these... One in my room, one in baby room, I take one with me all the time to someone's house, and one in my grandmas house... I could live without it....
customer_reviews.author: Hatemsoul

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: We had an older version which didn’t have the ability to pan the camera and the battery wasn’t great. Motorola stepped up an fixed those items. Great picture (day or night). Only ding is the odd brown / bronze color on the unit. Our old one had baby and just looked better. Doesn’t take away from function though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Great baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good baby monitor. I love that I can pan/zoom and speak to my baby from another room. The night camera also works great, although it reminds me a little bit of paranormal activity and sometimes I'm afraid a ghost will pop up on the screen or I'll see a piece of furniture floating. The one thing I wish it could do is create an app so that I can continue to monitor him while I'm not at home. Otherwise, the picture and sound quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Bran Age

product_meta.title: Motorola MBP36 Remote Wireless Video Baby Monitor withColor LCD Screen
product_meta.description:
Motorola's MBP36 Digital Video Baby Monitor with 3.5" color LCD screen is the perfect addition to your child's nursery or bedroom. Equipped with 2.4 Gigahertz FHSS technology to prevent crossed signals and to promote sound clarity. The 3.5" color LCD screen with 25 FPS refresh and infrared night vision will allow you to easily monitor the room environment, even in the dark, to ensure your child's comfort. The pan, tilt and zoom of the camera can be remotely adjusted while your child sleeps. The MBP36 is also equipped with impressive features like: room temperature monitoring, five polyphonic lullabies, additional camera capability, five LED alerts for noise level. This monitor also has a range of up to 200 meters and out of range warning, allowing you to move around the house or yard comfortably, knowing you will hear when your little one is awake. Warranty Information: Consumer Products One (1) year from the date of the products original purchase by the first consumer purchaser of the product. Consumer Accessories Ninety (90) days from the date of the accessories original purchase by the first consumer purchaser of the product. Consumer Products and Accessories that are repaired or replaced the balance of the original warranty or for Ninety (90) days from the date returned to the consumer, whichever is longer.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Motorola's MBP36 Digital Audio Baby Monitor will give you the reassurance that your child is resting peacefully. Equipped with 2.4GHz FHSS technology for sound clarity, you can feel comfortable your little one will come through loud and clear when they need you. A 3.5" LCD color display shows sound and video monitoring, with infrared night vision. Data encryption is built-in for added security. The MBP36 digital audio baby monitor has an impressive range of up to 200 meters with an out of range warning, allowing you to move around the house or yard comfortably, knowing you will hear when your little one is awake. The MBP36 Digital Audio Baby Monitor by Motorola is the perfect choice for any parent or caregiver.

3.5" LCD color display shows sound and video monitoring, with infrared night vision. 2.4GHZ FHSS TECHNOLOGY WITH TWO-WAY COMMUNICATION
The 2.4GHz FHSS technology offers a more reliable wireless connection over previous cordless technologies such as 900MHz cordless antennas. That means better range and less chance of missing something important in your baby's room due to a weak or dropped signal.

The MBP36 also features two-way communication for being able to speak or sing to your baby remotely, or to communicate with a partner in the room.

COLOR LCD SCREEN WITH INFRARED NIGHT VISION
A full-color 3.5" LCD display shows real-time video and sound in your baby's room with up to 25 FPS video playback, letting you can keep informed of what's going on visually as well as audibly. Infrared night vision means you can stay in touch with what's going in your baby's room without any lights to disturb little sleepers.

PAN, TILT, AND ZOOM
Control the MBP36's camera remotely to pan, tilt, and zoom the video image as needed.

Featuring remote pan, tilt, and zoom to allow for capturing video where it's needed. FIVE LULLABIES BUILT IN
Lull your baby to sleep with one of five polyphonic lullabies programmed into the MBP36.

DATA ENCRYPTION FOR SECURITY
The Motorola MBP36 encrypts the audio data it transfers for added security and peace of mind.

5 LED ALERTS FOR SOUND-ACTIVATED LIGHTS 
Five LEDs on the MBP36 baby monitor indicate the level of sound activity in the room, keeping you informed of what's going on visually as well as audibly.

ROOM TEMPERATURE MONITOR
The MBP36's transmitter is equipped with a room temperature sensor which is reported on the receiver's LCD display. You can ensure that it never gets too hot or too cold for your little one.

UP TO 200M RANGE WITH "OUT-OF-RANGE" WARNING
The superior wireless range of the MBP36 lets you keep connected to your baby up to 200 meters away. So even if you have a larger home, you don't have to give up safety or the ability to stay connected to your little one. An alarm sounds when you're getting out of range of the transmitting unit, so you'll never have to wonder if you're close enough to hear what's going on.

OPTIONAL ACCESSORIES (SOLD SEPARATELY)
When it's time to change the Motorola MBP36's battery, simply order this replacement.

The Motorola additional camera for the Motorola MBP36 Digital Video Baby Monitor with 3.5 inch color LCD screen. Add additional cameras to enhance your viewing area and allow you to keep an even better eye on your baby.
